TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Track extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一個處理 控制項位置和大小的原始控制項，以及兩個用來設定 的 控制項。

span.span: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a control and two controls that are used to set a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項沒有預設值。The control does not have a default . 其實作的一部分的和控制項。Its is implemented as part of the of the and controls. 具有控制項及兩個控制項，可用來變更屬性控制項。The has a control and two controls that are used to change the property of the control. 下圖顯示滑動軸上。The following illustration shows a on a slider. **滑桿上的追蹤****A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton、 縮圖](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 縮圖")![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") 下表顯示屬性和對應自動繫結到的屬性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties that they automatically bind to. 當任一屬性變更時，繫結的屬性也會變更。When either property changes, the bound property also changes. | 屬性 property| 屬性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 下表顯示屬性和對應屬性要繫結時屬於控制項和屬性未明確設定。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 屬性 property| 屬性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 下表顯示屬性和對應屬性要繫結時屬於控制項和屬性未明確設定。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 屬性 property| 屬性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 此外，屬性控制控制項繫結屬性控制項控制項。Additionally, the properties for the controls for a control bind with the properties for the controls of the control. 當用來捲動內容的大小控制項是成比例的百分比會出現在可檢視區域或檢視區的內容。When a is used to scroll content, the size of the control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport. 下圖顯示的範例實作控制項控制項。The following illustration shows an example of a control that implements a control. **追蹤控制捲軸****A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "捲軸圖例")![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") 下列計算用於計算的大小。The following calculation is used to compute the size of the . thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLengththumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength ViewportSize 參數為值的屬性。The viewportSize parameter is the value of the property. 最大和最小參數會對應至和屬性值。The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the and property values. 最大運算式的值 – 最小 + viewportSize 是可捲動內容的大小。The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content. 請注意，值屬性代表的內容捲動至底部的時。Note that the value of the property represents the of the when the content is scrolled to the bottom. 這值不是相同長度或範圍的內容。This value is not the same as the length or extent of the content. 如需詳細說明，請參閱。For a more detailed explanation, see . 的中會增加從上到下或從左到右的方向根據。The of a in a increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 同樣地，的中會增加從下至上或從左到右的方向根據。Similarly, the of a in a increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 若要變更增加值的方向，設定屬性至`true`。To change the direction of increasing value, set the property of the to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義控制 。The following example shows how to define a control in a . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#TrackDefinition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#trackdefinition)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDirectionReversed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定是否要從預設方向來反轉漸增 的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing is reversed from the default direction.

value.span: 如果 和 已交換位置，且漸增值的方向也已反轉，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the and the exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時的值設`true`、和中交換的位置。When the value of is set to `true`, the and the in the exchange places. 值增加從左到右的這兩個水平和控制項。 values increase from left to right for both horizontal and controls. 不過，垂直值而，增加從上到下，為垂直這些值增加從下至上。However, the values for a vertical increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical these values increase from bottom to top. 當您將屬性`true`，增加值的方向會反轉。When you set the property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses. 如果您實作一部分控制項，而且您沒有明確設定屬性，屬性繫結至屬性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何屬性內定義控制項範本時屬性是。The following example shows how the property is defined inside the control template when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Maximum { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的最大可能 。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible of the .
The largest allowable for the .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項處於控制項和屬性未明確設定，這個屬性會自動繫結與屬性。When a control is in a control and the property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the property. 值控制項相當於減去可見內容區域的檢視區大小的可捲動內容的大小。The value for a control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport. 例如，如果內容的大小是 100 和大小的屬性是 30，值屬性就是 70。For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the property is 30, the value of the property is 70. 這是 true 因為屬性控制項對應中會出現在檢視區上方的可捲動內容的位置。This is true because the property of the control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport. 當內容捲動至最底部，在此範例中時，30%的內容仍會出現在檢視區。When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport. 因此，對應的檢視區上方是 70，而值是 70。Therefore, the that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the value is 70. 下圖顯示如何對應中的位置的控制項。The following illustration shows how the corresponds to a position in the of a control. ![值會對應到內容的位置](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "值會對應到內容的位置")![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性會變成繫結來源屬性。The following example shows how to set the property for a that becomes the binding source for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ Thumb { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項，其用來變更 的 。

span.span: Gets the control that is used to change the of a .

value.span: 與 搭配使用的 控制項。

span.span: The control that is used with the .

value.span: 預設值是擁有預設設定的 控制項。

span.span: The default is a control that has default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位置的控制對應至的控制項。The placement of the control corresponds to the of the control. 大小控制控制項會反映那些的目前可見的內容量。The size of the control in a control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible. 大小控制計算如下：The size of the control of the is computed in the following ways: - 如果未指定屬性，大小是固定的預設值。If the property is not specified, the size of the is a fixed default value. 這是如何的追蹤函式內控制項。This is how the of a Track functions inside a control. - 如果指定屬性和內容的大小大於，使用下列公式：If the property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the , the following formula is used: 縮圖大小 = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / （最多 – 最小值 + ViewportSize）ThumbSize = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize) 位置參數的定義方式如下：Where the parameters are defined as follows: ||| |-|-| |縮圖大小ThumbSize|大小控制項 TrackLength 為相同的單位。The size of the control in the same units as the TrackLength.| |TrackLengthTrackLength|長度。The length of the .| |ViewportSizeViewportSize|會顯示內容的單位，例如文件的頁面數目在可捲動區域大小。The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.| |最大值Maximum|內容的單位，例如第 10 頁的 10 頁文件中的內容最大值。The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.| |最低Minimum|內容的單位，例如文件的第 1 頁中的內容最小值。The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.| 下圖顯示一些這些參數中的視覺表示法控制項。The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a control. ![檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度")![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length") - 如果內容的大小小於、不會出現和屬性設為`false`。If the size of the content is less than a , the does not appear and the property of is set to `false`. 最小大小為控制項由兩個系統參數，和。The minimum sizes for a control are determined by two system parameters, and . 最小大小中垂直控制項是 1/2 *和最小大小中在水平控制項是 1/2 * 。The minimum size for a control in a vertical is 1/2 * and the minimum size for a control in a horizontal is 1/2 * . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何內定義樣式時屬性是。The following example shows how the style is defined inside the when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可見之可捲動內容的部分大小。

value.span: 可捲動內容之可見區域的大小。

span.span: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示未定義內容大小。

span.span: The default is , which means that the content size is not defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性用來計算的大小控制時不。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control in a when the is not . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註屬性。For more information, see the remarks for the property. 若要明確定義的大小，建立衍生自物件類別，並提供覆寫和。To explicitly define the size of the , create an object that derives from the class and provide overrides for and . 如果您實作一部分控制項，而且您沒有明確設定屬性，屬性繫結至屬性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. 值屬性控制項中實作控制項一律是，因為控制項不會變更大小。The value of the property of a control that is implemented in a control is always , because the control does not change size. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您指定之子項目的藉由設定， ，和屬性。You specify the child elements of a by setting the , , and properties. 子項目會設定屬性的順序進行索引。The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
